mapper.select: SELECT B.POST_ID, B.PARENT_COMMENT_ID, B.POST_TITLE, B.POST_CONTENT, B.POST_DATE, B.FIXED, B.FAQ, B.LOCATION, B.READ, B.BOARD_ID, B.EMPLOYEE_NO, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, B.child_yn FROM BOARD_POST B LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON B.EMPLOYEE_NO = E.EMPLOYEE_NO WHERE B.POST_ID = ${postId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(post_id), 0) + 1 FROM board_post
INSERT INTO board_post ( post_id, parent_comment_id, post_title, post_content, post_date, fixed, faq, location, read, board_id, employee_no, child_yn ) VALUES ( #{postId}, #{parentCommentId}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, SYSDATE, 'N', 'N', NULL, 'N', #{boardId}, #{employeeNo}, 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE board_post SET faq = CASE WHEN faq = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END WHERE post_id = #{postId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.POST_ID, B.PARENT_COMMENT_ID, B.POST_TITLE, B.POST_CONTENT, B.POST_DATE, B.FIXED, B.FAQ, B.LOCATION, B.READ, B.BOARD_ID, B.EMPLOYEE_NO, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, B.child_yn, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.POST_ID DESC) AS rnum FROM BOARD_POST B LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON B.EMPLOYEE_NO = E.EMPLOYEE_NO WHERE B.BOARD_ID = 999 AND B.PARENT_COMMENT_ID IS NULL ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page} - 1) * 10 + 1 AND #{page} * 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.POST_ID, B.PARENT_COMMENT_ID, B.POST_TITLE, B.POST_CONTENT, B.POST_DATE, B.FIXED, B.FAQ, B.LOCATION, B.READ, B.BOARD_ID, B.EMPLOYEE_NO, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, B.child_yn, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.POST_ID DESC) AS rnum FROM BOARD_POST B LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON B.EMPLOYEE_NO = E.EMPLOYEE_NO WHERE B.BOARD_ID = 999 AND B.POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND B.PARENT_COMMENT_ID IS NULL ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page} - 1) * 10 + 1 AND #{page} * 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_POST WHERE BOARD_ID = 999 AND PARENT_COMMENT_ID IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_POST WHERE BOARD_ID = 999 AND PARENT_COMMENT_ID IS NULL AND POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board_post WHERE post_id = #{postId} or PARENT_COMMENT_ID = #{postId}
